p.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #FFFFFF; margin-left: 20px; margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px

td.p:
Student Learning Packet Pick-Up
***Student Learning packets are for students currently not connected online with Seesaw or Schoology.***
Due to the large quantity of packets for all grade levels we will no longer be able to deliver these with the meal deliveries. Starting this Thursday, April 9, all learning packets will be located in the vestibule of the main entrance to campus (Public Library entrance). They will be organized by grade level with student names on the packets. Doors to the vestibule will be open from 6:30 AM - 3 PM Monday thru Friday. This Friday they will be closed for Good Friday. Parents/students picking these up need to follow pick-up instructions posted on the doors, practice social distancing if others are present, and do not enter the school beyond the vestibule. Completed learning packet materials can be returned in the same envelope so that we have the students name and grade level clearly marked, and dropped in the Public Library Dropbox.

p.a: Due to Governor Whitmer's Executive Order 2020-35, CLK Schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. The Public Library will also be closed during this time.

img.alt: Homecoming Tug of War Group Photo

h1.style: text-align: left; margin-left: 35px; margin-right: 35px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 300;
h1.a: Greetings and Welcome to the Public Schools of Calumet, Laurium & Keweenaw

p.style: text-align: left; margin-left: 35px; margin-right: 35px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 20px
p.img: Thank you for taking time to visit the C-L-K Web site to learn more about one of the State's premier school districts. The Public Schools of Calumet, Laurium & Keweenaw was founded in 1867, and the success experienced by the district since then has truly been remarkable. While our Website tells a powerful story, the best way to get to know the school district is to come and visit us. I am convinced you will like what you see....Thank you.
